phrases: The Death of Dende... Come Forth!
He is smaller, more simple-looking, and less formidable...
He is become an excellent example of why you do not judge another's ability by outward appearances!
Everything he is looked like up until now has been cute by comparison!
After all the trouble you went through to revive me with the Dragonballs!
There is simply no way I can save the rest of you now.
Freeza, you have finally shown your true form, have you?
Freeza now has the power to destroy the universe as we know it.
This could be the point of no return!
Freeza's Ki has risen once again!
I did not see it coming!
A- All I saw was some kind of flash!
Now, there will be no more revivals.
I cannot tell what is going on any more!
He saw that we were being revived by that Namekian...
That is why he was first...
I made you a promise, did not I?
To show you a terror even greater than Hell's.
However, for that Namekian child there to not be able to experience this...
it seems a shame, does not it?
I will just have to let you guys take his share.
I could not see... him move... or attack...
Have his abilities gone up that much!?
You have got it all wrong.
I did not do it to save you.
I thought I would show you guys something good.
Do not tell me you... you think you can beat him?
You guys are in our way.
Pull back and watch very closely!
Or perhaps you are so frightened, something has snapped?
You just keep on smirking like that, while you still can.
What is this Super Saiyan business he is talking about?
As always, your jokes go too far.
In that case, I will show you the abilities I possess, now that I have become a Super Saiyan!
He is had an incredible power-up!
It is like he is a different person!
What the hell happened to him?
W- When a Saiyan recovers from near-death, their power goes up several times over!
Gohan, let us put our money on Vegeta, and take shelter for now.
You know, to think that suddenly, someone could have achieved this much of a power-up...
You can see it for yourself.
This is exactly why Vegeta purposely came close to dying,
then got himself revived by Dende.
S- So that is what he was doing, huh?
And now, Vegeta really is incredible!
With any luck, he might actually take Freeza!
They are both the same as they were before.
It is calm now, but unbelievably huge!
I cannot believe his Ki is so full!
Vegeta really might be able to beat Freeza at this point.
I am supposed to think that somehow you have powered up quite a bit.
Just be grateful you do not have a Scouter with you!
If your Scouter were to read my battle rating now, you would run away from here in tears!
The reason being, my power has now become even greater than yours!
This time, for sure, you are going to meet your end!
Are you too frightened to say anything?
I get you, I get you.
If you mean everything you said, then I have decided to see for myself the power of this so-called, legendary Super Saiyan,
Kakarrot will not even get a turn!
He is completely got Freeza on the run!
You cannot defeat me by running away!
There is no way I... a Super Saiyan like me could have lost sight of him!
I raise my speed in earnest for just a moment, and you cannot keep up, can you?
And you call yourself a Super Saiyan?
How can he toy with Vegeta, with all his power and speed?
He really is an unthinkable beast after all!
A little longer... a little bit longer, and I will have recovered!
and yet, it is still not enough to match Freeza's ultimate power?
What will be the fate of Vegeta, now that he has been shown his limits?
